mcq.statement: A healthcare worker bought of needle stick injury while taking a blood sample of HIV +ve patient. The worked just had this booster dose HIV vaccine, what should be the next step in the management regarding needle stick injury?

options.b: Give another booster dose of vaccine
options.c: Send HBSAg if positive start infection
options.d: Check and HBsAg antibodies tube and if adequate, proceed with monitoring
